entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Blowing snow. Wind east 80 km/h gusting to 110. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 90 km/h gusting to 120 diminishing to 70 gusting to 100 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
